title: Una tragedia ocultada. Miguel Angel  Cabodevilla  y Milagros Agu
description:
Este es el libro que se prohibio en Ecuador acerca de la matanza entre los Taromenani y Waorani en Marzo de 2013. 

This book is prohibited in Ecuador, it's about the slaughter between two indigenous populations, the taromenani and the Waorani, this happened on March of 2013.

The book was prohibited cause of the recent incidents about the explotation of the natural resources on the amazonic jungle in the Ecuadorian territory, when the government denied the existence of non-contacted tribes, pushed ahead with his explotation project, this book reveal the invisibilization of those people.
